sentences.english: It also promoted the World Expo 2010 at the World Expo in Aichi , Japan.
sentences.chinese: 它也促进了在日本爱知县世博会2010年世博会。

sentences.english: Toyohashi City, Aichi Prefecture, Japan TFM Choir Guest Conductor.
sentences.chinese: 日本国爱知县丰桥市TFM合唱团客席指挥。

sentences.english: A single local magistrate combines functions which ought to be distributed among at least six different officers.
sentences.chinese: 一个知县的职责，至少应该分给六个不同的官员。

sentences.english: As they withdrew their hands Chen would examine them.
sentences.chinese: 同时，知县在他们摸完后也查看了他们的手。

sentences.english: After lighting incense and chanting prayers, the magistrate had curtains erected around the bell.
sentences.chinese: 焚香诵经后，知县用一块布帘将钟挡了起来。

definition: prefectural magistrate (during Tang to Qing times)
county magistrate (during Tang to Qing times)
senior provincial government official in dynastic China
inspector-general of province in Ming and Qing times
official registrar (of a county etc) in imperial China
imperial censor (formal title of a dynastic official)
graduate/successful candidate in the imperial provincial examination
senior provincial official in imperial China
a scholar or government official living in one's village/a village gentleman/squire
